I can't seem to make the registration edits and Dopeman's regsetup.exe doesn't work either...It shows an error message for a split-second and then disappears again...Can anyone please tell me what's wrong with this:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2008]
"installdir"="C:\\Program Files\\Pro Evolution Soccer 2008"
"code"="NA9C97ANHSLC46R5JYM9"
"version"="1.00.0000"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2008\1.00.0000]

Thank you
Its all correct, problem is in your pc, thats why neither method don't work.

To further prove or disprove, try this:

Go to start-->Run--> Type: regedit -->click ok.

Go to -->File-->Import(top left) -browse for the (edited & saved)setup.reg file, click to import it.

play the game, or not.

Ok, still not working. Here is the error message I get:

PES2008.exe - Can't find part

This application can't be started because d3dx9_30/dll can't be found. Reinstalling can solve this problem.

THis is the translated error, it isn't English but Dutch on my pc. Anyway, this are the specs:

nVidia GeForce 8600 (256MB)
7200RPM 160GB HDD
Intel Core 2 Duo T7500 (2.2Ghz; 4Mb L2 Cache; 667Mhz FSB)
2048MB DDR2 RAM 667MHz (2 x 1024)
Windows XP Professional

having played the fifa series for a long time.. i decided to dl pes 2008, just to check it out. but after playing it for some time, i really knew that fifa 08 was way much better. here are some reasons why pes 2008 sucks
-first, from the beginning, the menu is so shitty. it takes a long time to get to another selection.
-they have a few small selection of stadiums.
-they use only adidas products
-all soccer balls and boots are adidas, and they still have a small variety.(fifa 08, uses adidas, nike, puma, and diadora procuts.
-players like Rooney, ronaldinho, and roque santa cruz and many others do not have their trademark boots...instead they use shitty "pes" boots.
-lots of teams including manchester united do not have proper uniforms... ie. manU is called manu red, and their crest is very different. it took me for ever to find them.
at the beginning, national teams do not sing their anthems.
-the songs are very crappy compared to fifa08.
-there is no "restart match" option in the menu while playing a game.
-it takes too long to load 
-the chants of the crouds are very cheap.
-fewer leagues.
-the looks of the players look very different. (i couldnt tell who some players were)
-there is no live podcast type thing. fifa 08 has a espn podcast that turns on when connected to the internet.
-and of course the gameplay is worse.

overall, pes 2008 sucks compared to fifa08.
it is a waste of almost 4G.
plz feel free to add anything i missed.

........FIFA 08!

Sadox, I totally agree with you, I can't see why some game mags think PES is better than Fifa. I also want to add this:

The devellopers were too lazy to replace the Xbox-360 controls, buttons and control setup menu with a normal keyboard. I don't know what A, B, X, Y etc. is on my keyboard, and I don't wanna know! I wanna play with a game that tells me A=shoot, D=pass, E=sprint etc.

They also didn't add widescreen at high ress and no real advanced settings, which is plain stupid.

Downloading this game was a waste of time. I would like to thank Dopeman for making the torrent, he can't help it that this game is bad either. Fifa 08 torrent, here I come ;)

sadox what the hell are you going on about? go back to fifa which has never had as much realism or proper gameplay like pes or winning eleven.

stadiums aren't all there? so what, do you spend your entire game looking at the ground?...

music is shit... yeah ok fair enough it isn't great.. never has been really.

how the hell did it take you ages to find man utd? man red, can't say its very difficult is it?! Can you guess who man blue are ;o)

You've just listed a load of stuff that we all know EA are good at, menus, music etc, where the real deal is about the gameplay, althou fifa 08 is improved (they just took a load of ideas from PES and stuck it in 08, I mean, look at all the previous FIFAs; shoot from anywhere outside the box and its pretty much a guaranteed goal) its still not like PES, where you have to play like the team does in real life to get anywhere. I don't think the ball is weighted rightly in PES7 but its leaps and bounds ahead of FIFA in gameplay terms.

Oh yeah and whoever was whinging about dopeman ripping what is apparently a shitty game, rip it urself you wanker!! hah.

Cheers DopeMan, thanks for your efforts...

Thank you dopeman. This really worked.
Here is what i did:
I extract it to C:\Program Files\PES2008\Pro Evolution Soccer 2008.
After that i download http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3856908.
From this one i got, regsetup.exe and regsetup (text document) In the regsetup (text document) i placed:
REGEDIT4

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2008]
"installdir"="C:\Program Files\\PES2008\\Pro Evolution Soccer 2008"
"code"="NA9C97ANHSLC46R5JYM9"
"version"="1.00.0000"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\KONAMI\PES2008\1.00.0000]

C:\Program Files\\PES2008\\Pro Evolution Soccer 2008" thats the place i extract it. You can place it anywere else.
So now i place the regsetup.exe and regsetup (text document) in the folder were i extract. Now you ready for playing, just double click on PES2008.exe
Hope it works.

hey guys if yoy dont now wich video card you must use... find a program names everest home edition and see wich slot you have for video card...AGP 4x, 8x, 16x or if is PCI or PCI Express... the minimum requirements are...
Windows XP
Intel Pentium IV 1.4GHz ou processador equivalente
512 MB RAM
7.0 GB de espaço livre em disco
4x DVD-ROM Drive
DirectX 9.0c compatível com placa de vídeo
64MB Pixel Shader 1.1 (NVIDIA GeForce 3 ou ATI Radeon 8500 video card)
DirectX 9.0c 100% compatível com placa de som
DirectX 9.0c ou superior (incluso na imagem)
Multiplayer: TCP/IP 192 kbps ou melhor
Teclado compatível com Windows
Resolução mínima de 640 x 480

extra:

For those of you having problems when it says 'Game is not installed' you didnt follow the instructions. in the setup.reg file in the path you need TWO (2) slashes, ex: C:\\Program Files \\PROevo2008\\

Found a solution for vista 64bit with 4GB.

Change setup.reg to this:

Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\KONAMI]

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\KONAMI\PES2008]
"installdir"="C:\\YOUR DIR\\Pro Evolution Soccer 2008"
"code"="NA9C97ANHSLC46R5JYM9"
"version"="1.00.0000"

[HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Wow6432Node\KONAMI\PES2008\1.00.0000]
